analysis.description: ELyXToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol#362-365) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol:
	Contract ELyXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ELyXToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol#339-345) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol#341-342)

ELyXToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0x0c9718a4b2f467dbcc9a71a442d715a2e6889e4c.sol#362-365)
